title: Dress (thawb)
description: predominately black dress with multicolored embroidery at chest, shoulders, and back; neck opening is circular and has a slit opening down to chest; embroidered decorations include geometric patterns and floral motifs; sleeves extend straight out from shoulders; red thread decorates panel stitching; embroidered bird motif on bottom of dress back
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
